reviewText: This was purchased for 12 years old grandson and he loves it.
Excellent. Especially interesting was how the earth was made. Gives current scientific thinking  as to why the earth is what it is today.
Everyone should view this. Presentation wasn't an overkill, movie last you decide about the future of this planet.
Provocative and informing.  Well done narrative and graphics kept me very engrossed.
This was a gift for my parent

The middle disc particularly is jammed full factual information about the history of global warming and extinction events in earth's geological history. It not only gives you the facts, it explains how the scientists discovered them.  The let scientists speak directly to the camera, which helps get rid of interpretation errors.
It was good as i expected
